Label: Selected Output
Notes: Display channel name on the switches
Hover help text in the status bar: Output Channel Number and Selection.
Keyboard shortcuts: Type �O� to switch to the Output Tab. Prompt in the status bar for 5 seconds to type a number and then return to select the corresponding output channel.

Label: Output Name
Hover help text in the status bar: Displayed Output Channel Name (editable).

Label: Array
enum: Single ; Array 1 ; Array 2 ; Array 3 ; Array 4 ; Array 5 ; Array 6 ; Array 7 ; Array 8 ; Array 9 ; Array 10
Hover help text in the status bar: Selected Output Channel is part of Array.

Label: Apply Changes to Array
Notes: Greyed out if channel not part of an array
Hover help text in the status bar: Apply Changes to the rest of the Array (Absolute value or Relative changes).

Label: Attenuation
Hover help text in the status bar: Output Channel Attenuation. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Delay/Latency comp.
Notes: Highlight �Latency Compensation� for negative values or �Delay� for positive values
Hover help text in the status bar: Output Channel Delay (positive values) or Latency Compensation (negative values). (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Position X
Hover help text in the status bar: Output Channel Position in Width.
Keyboard shortcuts: Left and Right Arrows to nudge to the left (--) in 0.1m increments

Label: Position Y
Hover help text in the status bar: Output Channel Position in Depth.
Keyboard shortcuts: Up and Down Arrows to nudge to the upstage (++) or downstage (--) in 0.1m increments

Label: Position Z
Hover help text in the status bar: Output Channel Position in Height.
Keyboard shortcuts: Page Up and Page Down to nudge to the up (++) or down (--) in 0.1m increments

Label: Orientation
Hover help text in the status bar: Output Channel Horizontal Orientation (0� means towards the audience in a frontal configuration). (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Angle On
Notes: angleOn+angleOff =< 180; adjust angleOff if angleOn is adjusted and sum is above 180
Hover help text in the status bar: Output Channel Will Amplify Objects in this Angle in its Back. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Angle Off
Notes: angleOn+angleOff =< 180; adjust angleOn if angleOff is adjusted and sum is above 180
Hover help text in the status bar: Output Channel Will Not Amplify Objects in this Angle in Front of it. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Pitch
Hover help text in the status bar: Output Channel Vertical Orientation used to Determine which Objects get amplified (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: HF Damping
Hover help text in the status bar: Loss of High Frequency Depending on Distance from Object to Output. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Array Position Helper
Hover help text in the status bar: Open Helper Window to Position Speaker Arrays Conveniently.

Label: Minimum Latency Enable
Hover help text in the status bar: Disables Minimal Latency Mode for Selected Output. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Live Source Attenuation Enable
Hover help text in the status bar: Disables Live Source Attenuation for Selected Output. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Floor Reflections Enable
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable or Disable the Floor Reflections for this Speaker.

Label: Distance Attenuation Percentage
Hover help text in the status bar: Ratio of Distance Attenuation for Selected Output. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Horizontal Parallax
Hover help text in the status bar: Horizontal Distance from Speaker to �Targeted� Listener. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Vertical Parallax
Hover help text in the status bar: Vertical Distance from Speaker to �Targeted� Listener. Positive when the Speaker is Below the head of the Listener. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: EQ Enabled
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable or Disables Equalisation of the Output Channel. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: EQ Shape
enum: OFF ; Low Cut ; Low Shelf ; Peak/Notch ; Band Pass ; High Shelf ; High Cut
Notes: This setting and the following are present for each 6 EQ band
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the EQ Mode for Band <Band ID> of the Output Channel. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: EQ Frequency
Notes: For each 6 EQ band / Greyed out but editable if band mode is set to �OFF�
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the EQ Frequency for Band <Band ID> of the Output Channel. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: EQ Gain
Notes: For each 6 EQ band / Greyed out but editable if band mode is set to �OFF�
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the EQ Gain/Attenuation for Band <Band ID> of the Output Channel. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: EQ Q
Notes: For each 6 EQ band / Greyed out but editable if band mode is set to �OFF�
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the EQ Q for Band <Band ID> of the Output Channel. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: EQ Slope
Notes: For each 6 EQ band / Greyed out but editable if band mode is set to �OFF�
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the EQ Slope for Band <Band ID> of the Output Channel. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Store Output Configuration
Notes: Store Output Configuration to file (make backup file and show confirmation in status bar)
Hover help text in the status bar: Store Output Configuration to file (overwrite with confirmation)

Label: Reload Output Configuration
Notes: Reload Output Configuration from file (confirmation in status bar)
Hover help text in the status bar: Reload Output Configuration from file (with confirmation)

Label: Reload Output Config. Backup
Notes: Reload Output Configuration from backup file (confirmation in status bar)
Hover help text in the status bar: Reload Output Configuration from backup file (with confirmation)

Label: Import Output Configuration
Notes: Store Output Configuration to file (with file explorer window)
Hover help text in the status bar: Store Output Configuration to file (with file explorer window)

Label: Export Output Configuration
Notes: Reload Output Configuration from file (with file explorer window)
Hover help text in the status bar: Reload Output Configuration from file (with file explorer window)
